info.name: Radiohead Blank Erased Fixed
info.description: Edits to a blank Radiohead site My response to: http://gizmodo.com/radiohead-has-erased-itself-from-the-internet-1774198782 http://www.theguardian.com/music/2016/may/01/radiohead-erase-internet-presence-album-release I am Singularity Utopia. I am not connected to Radiohead or Hi Odd Area in any way. Install this style then visit radiohead.com to reveal the message. NOW BIGGER BOLDER BETTER - NEW AND IMPROVED!
info.additionalInfo: Boo! First version archive. Updates: 6 May 2016, 8 May, 9 May, 14 May (reticulated striations), 15 May, 16 May. Now that Radiohead are de-blanking their site this style will likely have a limited shelf-life.
